logger.doc:name: Debug: Log Outbound
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { flowName: flow.name, apiName: app.name, Name: "Log Outbound", MetaData: "upsert request to SF", correlationId: correlationId, data: payload }]

logger.doc:name: Debug: Log Inbound
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { flowName: flow.name, apiName: app.name, Name: "Log Inbound", MetaData: "upsert request successfull to SF", correlationId: correlationId, data: payload }]

logger.doc:name: Info: Log Exit
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { flowName: flow.name, apiName: app.name, Name: "Log Exit", MetaData: "upsert request to SF completed", correlationId: correlationId, }]
